Text: BlackRock Inc. lifted its position in shares of Chart Industries by 12.6% in the 2nd quarter. BlackRock Inc. now owns 5,106,373 shares of the industrial products company's stock worth $392,575,000 after purchasing an additional 569,836 shares during the period.
